description: The Montane gets an upgrade this year. Atlas gave it their best-in-class tubular frame, the Reactiv™, for improved backcountry performance. In addition, they’ve upgraded to the StabiLock Heel Cleat making the Montane unstoppable. The perfect snowshoe to appreciate the quiet of winter and deep pow of the backcountry.
name: Montane Elektra 27 - Womens
